hero.name: Héctor Garza
hero.description: Computer Technology Engineer with Fullstack experience, specialized in web and mobile development. Passionate about technology, innovation and Artificial Intelligence.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Professional Journey
experience.description: Projects and roles where I have applied my skills to create innovative solutions.

achievements: Developed three key platforms: Promexma Marketplace (uniform distribution), Xpresa (customer satisfaction tracking) and Promexma Permits (document management) to optimize operations across 60+ branches.
Implemented an LLM-based system to address frequent customer queries, improving user experience and reducing operational load in customer service.
Developed a semantic cache system integrated with EdgeVerve chatbot for PDF data retrieval, reducing processing time by 90%.
Created a user-driven agent and task creation system with custom dashboards and charts, improving task management efficiency.

smartcolonia.title: SmartColonia: Comprehensive Neighborhood Management Platform
achievements: Developed a SaaS application with three user levels (Security Guard, Resident, Administrator) currently in beta phase with 200 users, projecting 1,000 users in six months.
Implemented access control modules, integrated payment system, community announcements and survey tools to improve neighborhood management.

cemex.title: Topography System - CEMEX
achievements: Individually developed as Software Architect a topographic quality control application for CEMEX Nacional, after another consulting firm failed in its implementation. Designed the system to automate calculations under SCT tolerances in paving.
Streamlined and accelerated critical processes by generating automatic graphs and instant release reports with a single click, transforming a manual process of hours into seconds.

labnl.title: LABNL Digital Bibliographic Collection: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Created a website for the bibliographic collection of the Nuevo León Citizen Laboratory using React and Google Sheets. Designed the site to centralize information about available books.
Helped approximately 20,000 people monthly find books of interest in the digital bibliographic collection, receiving 19,900 visitors in June 2024.

footer.aboutDescription: Computer Technology Engineer with Fullstack development experience. Passionate about creating innovative solutions using the latest technologies and applying Artificial Intelligence concepts.
